title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, April 23, 2015
description: Airing on Thursday, April 23, 2015: First up, Erna Alfred Liousas, analyst at Forrester, joins us to talk Facebook earnings. Plus, Jill Bronfman, Adjunct Professor of Law at the UC Hastings Institute for Innovation law, talks about national cybersecurity legislation. We'll also speak with Sydney Padua about her graphic novel, "The Thrilling Adventures of Lovelace and Babbage: The (Mostly) True Story of the First Computer."
